page.title: 08LLANGURIG, EVENTS
page.content: Due to the small population there are few regular events, but those outlined are strongly supported by the local people. The{annual show}is always held on the second Saturday in August. There are various classes for sheep, dogs and horses, horticulture, and various forms of arts and crafts. Sheepdog trials, childrens sports and a clay pigeon shoot are held too. The show society find difficulty each year to keep the show attractive. { Dernol Valley Gymkhana}is a recently formed event committed to raising money for various charities. The organisers are enthusiastic and provide a great service to young horse lovers.{Geraint Hughes, Pencroesau, has ridden for the David Davies Pony Club at the 1984 Horse of the Year Show at Wembley.
